00021 
00022 #include "gvector.h"
00023 
00024 namespace GVector {
00025 
00026 #ifdef GVECTOR_SSE_OPTIMIZATIONS
00027 template <> vector3d<float> vector3d<float>::transform(const matrix3d<float> &M) const
00028 {
00029   float _x, _y, _z;
00030   __m128 v1, v2, rx, ry, rz;
00031   
00032   v1 = _mm_load_ps(&coefficients[0]);
00033   v2 = _mm_load_ps(&M.elements[0]);
00034   rx = _mm_dp_ps(v1,v2,0xF1);
00035   
00036   
00037   v1 = _mm_load_ps(&coefficients[0]);
00038   v2 = _mm_load_ps(&M.elements[4]);
00039   ry = _mm_dp_ps(v1,v2,0xF1);
00040   
00041   v1 = _mm_load_ps(&coefficients[0]);
00042   v2 = _mm_load_ps(&M.elements[8]);
00043   rz = _mm_dp_ps(v1,v2,0xF1);
00044   
00045   _mm_store_ss(&_x,rx);
00046   _mm_store_ss(&_y,ry);
00047   _mm_store_ss(&_z,rz);
00048   
00049   vector3d<float> q;
00050   q.set(_x,_y,_z);
00051   return q;
00052 }
00053 
00054 template <> float vector3d<float>::sqlength() const
00055 {
00056   return sse_dot_product<float>(coefficients,coefficients,0x71);
00057 }
00058 
00059 template <> float vector3d<float>::dot(const vector3d<float> p) const
00060 {
00061   return sse_dot_product<float>(coefficients,p.coefficients,0x71);
00062 }
00063 
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 };
